ISSUE.TITLE: UPS and ShipStation plugins break cart
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.1 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Install UPS Plugin 2. Configure it to get rates 3. Enable Only UPS (turn others off) (/Admin/Shipping/Providers) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20989983/111852340-f2142d00-88ec-11eb-98d3-b40fc6cc1efe.png) 4. Add an item to your cart that requires shipping 5. Go to Cart Get the below error: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20989983/111852373-0e17ce80-88ed-11eb-89ef-ecf72731cdb9.png) The UPS Version of GetFixedRateAsync returns null and causes the error (public class UPSComputationMethod) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20989983/111852399-2687e900-88ed-11eb-8d90-b9672191b819.png) ------------------------------------------------------ When I turn "Manual (Fixed or By Weight and By Total)" on the error goes away: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20989983/111852462-651da380-88ed-11eb-9a4d-f8974a7695c4.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20989983/111852471-6fd83880-88ed-11eb-808c-730d2614ef90.png) This was tested on a 4.40.1 download on 3/16

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5554 Fixed problem with a returned null value from async methods
#5554 Fixed problem with a returned null value from async methods
